about_the_game:
Meet the only DLC content that can make the original BoneTown look tame: the BoneTown Kinks DLC.

Do you only want just the Lesbian sex from the Kinks DLC? Then the Kinks Lesbian DLC is perfect thing for you. This DLC only includes the new lesbian sex, characters, levels, and competitions, and none of the other stuff. You can turn Lesbian Mode on and play the entire game having sex with your lesbian avatar instead of your guy character.



The new Threesome Mode allows you to pick up two people at once, and have sex with both of them. Have you dreamed of a threesome with a sorority girl and a stoner? How about a party girl and a punk? The choices are endless.



Play the entire game as a lesbian. When Lesbian Mode is turned on, you will use only your customizable lesbian avatar during sex, because sometimes all you want is girls girls girls.



Tired of watching girls do each other with dildos or straps? Turn on Futa Mode and chicks with dicks will appear around the world, giving a whole new dimension to lesbian sex.



Now when you strip down a girl in BoneTown, you have a chance of finding a sexy surprise: some girls are now wearing racy lingerie under their outfits.



On top of the four lesbian sex positions already in the game, unlock five new lesbian sex positions to use in Lesbian Mode or in Threesomes: Dildoing Butts, Sucking Strap-ons, Fisting, Missionary, and Anal Pile-driver.



Three new interior levels are the hubs for the new kinks:

  • The Bearded Clam Lesbian Bar
  • Chicks w/ Dicks Fried Chicken and Fill ‘Er Up Gas Station
  • The Gore House BDSM Club



4 new Competitions will not only highlight all the new kinks, but also unlock some of the new sexual positions.



With the new interiors come 2 new character types: Transitioning Lesbians, Futa girls, and BDSM Participants.



The Kinks DLC is first time we’ve exposed all the clothing, voices, hair, body sizes, lingerie, dicks, and everything else that makes up our characters in single, easy to use places. But . . . this is a video game, so gaining access to all that great content’s got to be earned. You’ll unlock more options in each one of these customizers by completing the original game’s story-line as well as the new Kinks competitions.



Make your main character just how you want him. A stoner blinged out in gangster attire? A crackhead in a business suit with his dick hanging out? We don’t judge, it’s up to you.



This is the place where you can go wild crafting the girl who’s just right for you. A black girl who sounds like she’s Asian? A schoolgirl trapped in a BDSM body? The heart desires what the heart desires.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes explicit girl on girl sexual acts where the girls use their mouth as well as toys to stimulate their girl partner. None of the content is hidden and you are able to see everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 2800+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card supporting Pixel Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1GB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Experience all new types of sex. Lesbian sex, Threesomes and Futa girls are only the beginning. And play the entire game in the new Lesbian Mode where you can play the entire game having sex as your Lesbian Avatar.
